panels.description: Total Requests Per Cluster, by Request Type

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_latency_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Request Throughputs

panels.description: Total Timeouts, Failures, Unavailable Rates for each cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_failures_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_timeouts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_unavailables_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_unfinished_commit{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_condition_not_met{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_contention_histogram_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_failures_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_timeouts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_unavailables_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_unfinished_commit_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_condition_not_met_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, request_type) (rate(stargate_client_request_contention_histogram_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Error throughputs

panels.description: Part of reads in the total of standard requests (Reads+Writes). CAS, Views, ... operations are ignored.

targets.expr: ( sum by (cluster) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Read"}[1m:30s]))  ) / (sum by (cluster) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Read"}[1m:30s])) + sum by (cluster) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Write"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Read / Write Distribution

panels.description: Read latency for coordinated reads

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Read"}[1m:30s])) by (le, cluster))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Read"}[1m:30s])) by (le, cluster))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Read"}[1m:30s])) by (le, cluster))
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.98", request_type="read"}*1000000
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.99", request_type="read"}*1000000
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.999", request_type="read"}*1000000

panels.title: Read Latency (98 - 999th percentile)

panels.description: Write latency for coordinated writes

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Write"}[1m:30s])) by (le, cluster))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Write"}[1m:30s])) by (le, cluster))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type="Write"}[1m:30s])) by (le, cluster))
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.98", request_type="write"}*1000000
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.99", request_type="write"}*1000000
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.999", request_type="write"}*1000000

panels.title: Write Latency (98th - p999 Percentile)

panels.description: Other p99 latencies for coordinated requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", request_type!~"Write|Read|.*-.*"}[1m:30s])) by (le, request_type, cluster))
stargate_client_request_latency_quantile{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", quantile=~"0.99", request_type!~"write|read|.*-.*"}*1000000

panels.title: Other Latencies

panels.description: Nodes Status uses Internal/Gossip activity. Be mindful that if Native or Thrift protocol are disabled, the nodes won't be reachable, and still marked up

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, pod_name) (changes(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_thread_pools_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node", pool_name="GossipStage", pool_type="internal"}[1m:30s])) > bool 0

panels.title: Nodes Status

panels.description: Nodes up and down in the cluster

targets.expr: count by (cluster) (max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_compaction_completed_tasks{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Nodes Count

panels.description: Nodes up and down in the cluster per protocol/activity

targets.expr: count by (cluster) (max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_compaction_completed_tasks{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Nodes Status History

panels.description: Disk space used ordered (fullest disks first)

targets.expr: max by(host, device) (host_filesystem_used_ratio{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})

panels.title: Disk Space Usage

panels.description: Total sizes of the data on distinct nodes

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_live_disk_space_used{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})
sum by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_total_disk_space_used{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Cassandra cluster Data Size

panels.description: SSTable Count Max and Average per table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_live_ss_table_count{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})
max by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_live_ss_table_count{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: SSTable Count

panels.description: Maximum pending compactions on any node in the cluster

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})
min by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Compactions

panels.description: Maximum pending compactions per table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_compactions{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Compactions per Table

panels.description: Cluster wide pending threads, by thread pool name

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, pool_name) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_thread_pools_pending_tasks{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Tasks

panels.description: Cluster wide blocked threads, by thread pool name

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, pool_name) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_thread_pools_total_blocked_tasks{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Blocked Tasks

panels.description: Dropped messages rate summed by message type and cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, message_type) (rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_dropped_message_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Dropped Messages

panels.description: active threads summed per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, pool_name) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_thread_pools_active_tasks{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Active Tasks

panels.description: Sum of hints being handed off per cluster.

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_storage_total_hints_in_progress{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: Hinted Handoff

panels.description: Maximum CPU utilisation (max 100%)

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (host) (rate(host_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle",cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (host) (rate(host_cpu_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

min by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (host) (rate(host_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle",cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (host) (rate(host_cpu_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

avg by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (host) (rate(host_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle",cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (host) (rate(host_cpu_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Max Unix load on a node for a cluster

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (host_load1{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})
min by (cluster) (host_load1{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster) (host_load1{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})

panels.title: Unix Load (1m rate)

panels.description: Maximum Memory allocated per usage (worst node) - excludes caches, buffers, etc

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (host_memory_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})
min by (cluster) (host_memory_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster) (host_memory_used_bytes{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})

panels.title: Memory Utilisation

panels.description: Disk read throughput

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (rate(host_disk_read_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
min by (cluster) (rate(host_disk_read_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
avg by (cluster) (rate(host_disk_read_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Read Thoughput

panels.description: Disk write throughput

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (rate(host_disk_written_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
min by (cluster) (rate(host_disk_written_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
avg by (cluster) (rate(host_disk_written_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Write Thoughput

panels.description: Network In and Out per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (rate(host_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster) (rate(host_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Percentage of the time the node is *not* doing a GC, thus Cassandra is not stopped for GC

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]) + rate(jvm_gc_g1_old_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000))

min by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]) + rate(jvm_gc_g1_old_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000))

avg by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s]) + rate(jvm_gc_g1_old_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000))

panels.title: Application Throughput (% time NOT doing GC)

panels.description: Garbage collection duration

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
min by (cluster) (rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
avg by (cluster) (rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Garbage Collection Time

panels.description: Maximum JVM Heap Memory size (worst node) and minimum available heap size

targets.expr: max(jvm_memory_bytes_used) by(area)

min by (cluster)
        (jvm_memory_bytes_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", host=~"$node"})

avg by (cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

min by ( cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_max{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$node"})

panels.title: JVM Memory Utilisation
